definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
Mobike, operator of an app-driven bicycle-rental business in China, established in 2015
see 水上摩托車|水上摩托车[shui3 shang4 mo2 tuo1 che1]

sentences.english: With the oil prices up, people would rather to use E-bike.
sentences.chinese: 随着石油价格的上涨，人们更加愿意使用电单车。

sentences.english: I used to go to school by bike.
But long time's spinning can damage hearing.
sentences.chinese: 但是长时间骑动感单车会损伤听力。

sentences.english: Motorcycle stunts performed by the late 'Little Black' Ko Shou Liang.
sentences.chinese: 电单车特技由小黑柯受良演出。

sentences.english: Monitor production performance in terms of Faults Per Vehicle, ANDON, First Time Through, etc.
sentences.chinese: 监管单车缺陷，ANDON，一次通过率等生产绩效。

sentences.english: After the time of exercise lesson, please do not go to the sensible bicycle room.
sentences.chinese: 课程以外时间段，请勿进入动感单车室。

sentences.english: It is beneficial to us. E-bike has been changed our living.
sentences.chinese: 电单车对我们有益处，改变着我们的生活。

sentences.english: The popularity of bicycling continues to rise, and it is no surprise.
sentences.chinese: 骑单车能继续风魔，其实一点也不奇怪。

sentences.english: He fell off the bike and was badly hurt.
sentences.chinese: 他从单车上摔下来，受了很重的伤。

sentences.english: Many innovations are coming from MTB, Road, and other forms of cycling.
sentences.chinese: 许多创新都来自山地车，公路，以及其他形式的单车。

sentences.english: Cycling and spinning are also effective cross-training options.
sentences.chinese: 骑脚踏车或是动感单车同样是交叉训练的有效选择。

sentences.english: It is completed that is test of single vehicle and immovable train.
sentences.chinese: 完成了该制动机的单车试验与牵引列车定置试验。

sentences.english: But he flashes an infectious smile as he greets a minivan full of visitors, and it’s not only kids clamoring for a chance to glide through the air.
sentences.chinese: 只听孩子和大人都在为试玩空中单车叫嚷着。

sentences.english: Nan and a group of classmates are going on their own cycling tour of Hainan.
sentences.chinese: 南至超和一组同学计划着他们的海南单车行。

sentences.english: Her bike got stuck fast between the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 她的单车紧紧地卡在丛树中。

sentences.english: B: Well, I love to do push-ups, and I go cycling every day.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢做俯卧撑，每天我都骑单车。

definition: yellow bicycle (by Ofo bicycle sharing company)
Mobike, operator of an app-driven bicycle-rental business in China, established in 2015
to ride (a bicycle, horse, motorbike etc)/cycling/horseback riding/motorbike riding/a ride/CL:次[ci4]
